resources.string: You will get reminder notification, about items left, an hour before you leave home and hotel.
Make a list of items needed in a clean and sleek UI.
Don"'"t forget to bring back your items!
Taking item is only half of job, make sure you bring it back.
More functionality and better UI will be added later as I learn. \n \nRemember, Remember the LCUKERD.
Found a bug or share an idea.

v1.3 
1.Changed UI and color scheme for better visuals. 
2.Fixed algo that showed wrong info in the notification. 
3.Reduced time and duration of toasts. 
4.Added few Instructions. 
v1.2 
1. Added option to store travel schedule. 
2. Notification to remind about items left an hour before departure from home and hotel. 
3. Added option to add note to items. 
4. Added instruction to swipe on starting screen. 
 v1.0 
Initial Release
